name: GEOMETRY BEAR
description:
So this is a game actually I edit from Tutorial I got from GDEVELOP 5. Geometry Monster which I change the character.  Change the colour. Add some scene. Change here and There. I hope you like playing it. It's free after all.

To play you just touch the screen right to move right and left to move left. Also please get away from the bomb. You will lose one life if you touch it.
